verbose_text: In addition, expression of PGC-1alpha is increased by p38 MAPK [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], and the overlap in bioenergetic and antioxidant signaling is further indicated based on p38 MAPK activation by AMPK [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR], oxidative stress [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR], and beta-adrenergic signaling [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
